name: Chicken Wings 4 - Gold Rush
description:
Roost-Air is still in business. Seemingly unaffected by the economy the flying chickens are still going strong with Julio keeping Chuck flying and Chuck continuing to make the airspace less safe. 
Is Hans floating his yogurt money into the FBO?
Will Chuck finish his Corsair this year?
Is Julio ever going to get a few days off?

What we do know is that Chuck once again is getting himself tangled up in all kinds of aviation adventures from flight instructing, to homebuliding, into RC planes and model rockets, over flight simming, all the way to flying helicopters.
Chuck has to take a checkride and even applies to become an astronaut. He is also working on finding out more about the mystery chick at the bar and trying to help Julio in the hangar.
Then one day a call comes in for Roost Air to deliver parts to the last frontier....

159 pages, full color. 
Product dimensions: 7 7/8 x 7 7/8 x 1/2 inches, 19 oz. 
ISBN 978-1-4675-2065-2 
Published by Michael and Stefan Strasser

name: Chicken Wings 3 - Think Big
description:
With employees like these, it is one of aviation’s greatest mysteries how “Roost Air” manages to stay in business. But here they are again! In this third Chicken Wings comic collection, Chuck and his fellow chickens seamlessly pick up where they left off in the last book and continue to live through the ups and downs of flying for a living.

Besides unsettling the airspace, Chuck also embarks on the high-flying mission of building his own vintage airplane. Will he succeed? Oh, the unbearable, nerve-wracking suspense! Buy the book and find out!

159 pages, full color.
Product dimensions: 7 7/8 x 7 7/8 x 1/2 inches, 18 oz.
ISBN 978-1-60702-858-1
Published by Michael and Stefan Strasser

name: Chicken Wings 2 - Full Throttle
description:
Whoever said chickens can’t fly? The eagerly awaited sequel of of the successful new aviation comic series “Chicken Wings” is here! Including more strips, more aviation, more “fowl” jokes, the full-color masterpiece “Chicken Wings 2 – Full Throttle” shows that the Strasser brothers’ cocky proclamation that “they’ve only just begun” was not an empty threat!

Those magnificent chickens in their aerial machines are back to mess up your airspace and bring you knee-slapping laughter again, all of them being a year older but none the wiser.

105 pages, full color.

name: Chicken Wings COMBO!
description:
Get all 4 of our Chicken Wings Books in this special super saver combo for a price less than 3 books! Save $17.95!!

Chicken Wings – The First Book (ISBN 978-0741427182)

Chicken Wings 2 – Full Throttle (ISBN 978-1-4243-1029-6)

Chicken Wings 3 – Think Big (ISBN 978-1-60702-858-1)

Chicken Wings 4 - Gold Rush (ISBN 978-1-4675-2065-2)

name: SUPER SAVER COMBO
description:
AVIATION COMIC CANON The ultimate collection of aviation related comic books in our shop. It consists of the following books:
  • Chicken Wings – The First Book
  • Chicken Wings 2 – Full Throttle
  • Chicken Wings 3 – Think Big
  • Chicken Wings 4 - Gold Rush
  • Ding Duck - I want to fly
  • Please Wait, to be seated
  • Going Up, Sir
  • Good Landing
Get them all together, save a bunch of money, PAY ONLY $0.99 USD FOR SHIPPING, and be entertained for many weeks!

name: Chicken Wings - The First Book
description: The Classic! “Chicken Wings” is the first of its kind aviation humor book designed to entertain the airplane enthusiast, air show visitor, cartoon lover, flight student, and pilot alike. In the style of aviators everywhere (chickens are aviators of a sort, aren’t they?) the dedicated employees of Roost Air “commit” their special aviation moments in a way that is all too true to life and down right hilarious. Professional pilots in particular may even find themselves, after recovering from sidesplitting laughter, reflecting on the fact that there are lessons to be learned from the antics of the gang at Roost Air. This book includes all of our original black & white strips who were initially only passed around Mike's office and airport and once made it into a 5 page booklet many many moons ago. It's our only black and white book and you can really see the characters evolving from their early stages. Edited, printed and produced in the United States of America! 87 pages, black and white.

name: Christmas Card COMBO
description:
A combo of our three Christmas Cards:

"Last Minute Charter" Christmas Card

"Have A Fun Christmas" Card

"Christmas Hugs" Card

Includes 3 envelopes. Product dimensions: 5x7”

name: Chicken Wings - Chuck's Helicopter Adventures
description:
Helicopter people behold! 
This is our first comic book just for you with 36 pages of Chuck’s helicopter adventures!

We are trying something new this time by going with a classic comic book / magazine type format and focusing simply on just a bunch of Chuck’s colorful helicopter comics. By dropping the fancy thick book cover we are able to give this to you for a classic comic book price as well.

Included in this book are our collection of helicopter and helicopter-related strips from Chuck’s adventures, some of them from our other books but with previously unpublished material included as well.
Also new is that we are including a few very early black-and-white classics with a little history about how they came to be and stories about the initial days of Chicken Wings.
Enjoy!

37 pages, full color
Product dimensions: 10 ½  x 8 x ¼, 4 oz.
Published by Michael and Stefan Strasser

name: My First Airplane Coloring Book
description:
Chicken Wings' "My First Airplane Coloring Book" features characters and designs from Chicken Wings, as well as a variety of other illustrations of aircraft. 
If you are a pilot, chances are that your offspring is already infected with the aviation virus. And if not, the "First Airplane Coloring Book" by Chicken Wings might be the first step to get your son or daughter (or any other kid, for that matter) hooked on the fascinating world of flying! 
In any case, with the additional bonus of maybe producing a few minutes of peace and quite, this book is the perfect present!

Crayons: For only an extra Dollar we add a small package of Crayola crayons (8pcs). They're non-toxic, teacher preferred, and made in the USA!

32 pages, black and white
Published by Michael and Stefan Strasser
ISBN 978-1-60461-770-2

name: Ding Duck - I Want To Fly
description:
All the way from Australia:

A brand new book by Gary Clark, featuring the famous Ding Duck from the highly successful comic series “The Swamp”.

This book is a snapshot of the wonderful and diverse world of aviation…It is about Commercial Air Transport, Military Jets, Helicopters, Aerobatics, General Aviation, Recreational Flying, and... Duck. Mostly it’s about Duck aviation... In particular one unique Duck named Ding.

Despite receiving over 5000 flying lessons and many attempts, Ding Duck still can’t fly. But that doesn’t stop him trying and failing and trying again. The Swamp that Ding calls home features two good runways, an Air Traffic Controller, a Flying School and a host of other assorted wildlife including all the other Ducks who get to do what Ding is hoping to do himself one day.. Fly South for the Winter with all the other Ducks.

As you follow Ding’s daily life cycle of flying attempts, failures, flying lessons, theory classes, exams and everything else that goes on in this feathered parallel world to the other less natural, mechanical form of aviation you will discover a wonderful truth: There is little difference between these two worlds and there is much humor to be enjoyed in both.

This book is dedicated to everyone who has ever wanted to fly.

name: Aviation Humor
description:
Surely you have seen a few of the aviation jokes that have been circling around the internet for years. Now you have them all collected in one single book, a “tell-all” book so to speak. 
Ziva Bergman, who is a commercial pilot, has carefully collected about 500 jokes and also hundreds of one-liners (aviationisms…) and included them all in this handy 8.5” x 6” sized book with 148 pages.
The over 700 entries in this book make it the book with the most aviation humor ever published.

It is text only, no cartoons.

name: T-Shirt "Japanese Skywriter"
description:
There is a lot of difficult and dangerous jobs in the big field of aviation. But arguably the toughest one is Japanese Skywriter! You can use this t-shirt to remind the big-shots out there that there are even tougher jobs than theirs! 

Color: Steel Blue.

About our t-shirts: 
All the t-shirts you can find in the shop are high quality "Port Authority" 6.1oz. cotton shirts and not just a cheap shirt to put a "fowl" joke on.

name: Ding Duck - Full Power Ding Duck
description:
We are super-stoked to be the first ones in the US to introduce the Ding Duck Book from the Australian cartoon series "Swamp" by Gary Clark. Most of you may know him from his website or from samples of his cartoons in the Martin Leeuwis books. He has a huge following in Australia and can be found in all of Australias newspapers.

Full Power Ding Duck is a 128 pages of classic Swamp Aviation, Military and Wild Duck cartoons. 

Follow the ups and mostly downs of the worlds worst flying student Ding Duck as he attempts to fly. 
 
Book dimensions 218mm x 230mm ( Includes 12 pages of full colour strips )

name: Julio's Hat "pre-work"
description:
As you all know, Julio is known for wearing a red ball cap all day, every day, and backwards so the brim doesn't get in the way while he is working.
Now you can have Julio's "Roost Air" hat as well.

"ROOST AIR" logo embroidered in the front.

Port & Company six panel twill cap
Adult size
adjustable strap in the back, velcro, just like Julio's hat

name: T-Shirt "ATC"
description:
Backside reads "ATC -Do as I say or get the hell out of my airspace!"

Front reads "ATC".

So you're an Air Traffic Controller and want to extend your authority you have over pilots to other parts of your life? This t-shirt might be the first step towards achieving that goal! (Caution: Might create conflict or confusion with more than one person in a room wearing this shirt). 

And of course this shirt also works for everybody else who just wants to look "official" at a first glance and then make people laugh. But be warned! It might not help trying to get you into a club or through the yellow tape at a crime scene investigation! 

(if it does, then please write us so we can change our product description!)

name: T-shirt "ATC" - soft
description:
Ok, so we realized some of you might not be able to wear our more hardcore shirt in certain facilities, so we cam up with a cleaner, "softer" version of this shirt.


Backside reads "ATC -Do as I say or get out of my airspace!"

Front reads "ATC".

So you're an Air Traffic Controller and want to extend your authority you have over pilots to other parts of your life? This t-shirt might be the first step towards achieving that goal! (Caution: Might create conflict or confusion with more than one person in a room wearing this shirt). 

And of course this shirt also works for everybody else who just wants to look "official" at a first glance and then make people laugh. But be warned! It might not help trying to get you into a club or through the yellow tape at a crime scene investigation! 

(if it does, then please write us so we can change our product description!)

name: Propeller Letter Opener
description:
New from the Boeing Store: A Propeller Letter Opener!
It’s a great gift for every pilot. With its streamlined design of heavy zinc alloy and brushed-metal finish, it makes a beautiful object d’art for every desktop. And it really spins!
 
Measures approximately 7.5” in length.

CAUTION: requires an 8” clutter free radius on your desk in order to freely spin!
 
Chuck already broke his, since he spun it so fast it took off…..

name: T-Shirt "UH-1 Huey" - Slim Fit
description:
High quality cotton 4600 style slim fit t-shirt featuring a Vietnam Era Army UH-1B Helicopter. No further explanation necessary. The Huey was the coolest helicopter to ever take to the skies, period.
Officially licensed by Bell Helicopter, a Textron Company.

Image printed on the front in ammo-can yellow.

Slim Fit high quality cotton t-shirt 

Machine washable

100% cotton

Color: military green

name: T-Shirt "Aerodynamics Lesson 1"
description:
Probably our most popular t-shirt. Teach others the laws of aerodynamics. Featuring "Slip, Drag, P-Factor, and CG" explanations for everybody to understand! Perfect for flight instructors to make sure the basic lessons sink in every time they turns their back to their students when writing on the board....

The shirt will also tell you if you are dealing with "pedestrians" (probably not laughing at the pictures) or "aviators" or "aviation educated" people (most likely cracking up at your t-shirts) which could come in handy. "Handy for what?" you might ask....   Well we don't really know yet. But you get the point, right?! 

About our t-shirts: 
 All the t-shirts you can find in our shop are high quality "Port Authority" 6.1oz. cotton t-shirts and not just a cheap shirt to put a "fowl" joke on. 
 They are slightly over-sized to compensate for any little "shrinkage" that might occur so that they will be the advertised size after 4 to 5 times of washing, unlike some of their competitors which shrink and end up a size smaller. We can also say with confidence that they last for a long time. Mikes fire crews all wear the same style shirts, with one of Stefs numerous designs on them, of course. And those shirts have to endure some of the harshest conditions know to man in the brutal sun of the Nevada or Arizona deserts, getting washed down with fire retardant, enduring massive amounts of sweat in the heat, and so on... And they have held up great!

name: Good Landing
description:
"Good Landing" is the first book of the now famous aviation comics and cartoon collection by Martin Leeuwis!

The book contains 160 pages with cartoons and comics from 20 different artists from around the world. Each artist fills some pages, none of them more than 8% of total book, and they all look at aviation on their own, special, way. Of course, it also includes 13 pages of Chicken Wings comics! About half of the book is in full color.

English, 160 pages, 50% color, 50% black and white, A5 size softcover.

Contributing Artists:

Ton van Andel, Philippe Abbet, Jan van Alphen, Johan Baas, Roger Brunel, Gary Clark, Iain Dick, Nina Dietrich + Harald Havas, Toon van Driel, Fabian Goossens, Michael Hopkins, Bob Leenders, Annebet Leeuwis, Chris Manno, Helmut Mauch, Barry Munden, Herbert Plompen, Mike Ray, Stefan + Mike Strasser, Dimitri Verdoodt

name: Please Wait, to be seated!
description: “Please Wait, to be seated” is the third book of the very succesful aviation cartoon collection put together by Martin Leeuwis. This time he found 30 artists from around the globe to contribute and it includes 9 pages of “Chicken Wings” as well. This will hopefully hold you guys over until our 4th book comes out! English, 160 pages, 350 cartoons, almost 50% color, A5 size softcover. Contributing Artists: Ton van Andel, Philippe Abbet, Jan van Alphen, Johan Baas, Jean-Luc Beghin, Nicola Bolton, Roger Bowles, Roger Brunel, Gary Clark, Nina Dietrich, Andrew Dodd, Martin Germans, Jason Hall, Patrick Harrington, Rob Knotts, Bob Lang, Bob Leenders, Annebet Leeuwis, Helmut Mauch, Theresa McCracken, Barry Munden, Willy Peeters, Tom Phelps, Nicolas Pug, Rabhea Roth, Chris Signore, Bob Stevens, Stefan and Mike Strasser, Dimitri Verdoodt, Clifford Witkowski

name: Going Up, Sir
description:
"Going Up, Sir" is the successor of the very successful book "Good Landing", another collection of aviation related comics and cartoons by 21 different artists from around the world. Each artist fills some pages of the 160 pages, none of them more than 8% of total book, and they all look at aviation on their own, special, way. Of course, it also includes 13 pages of Chicken Wings comics! About half of the book is in full color.

English, 160 pages, 50% color, 50% black and white, A5 size softcover.

Contributing Artists:

Ton van Andel, Philippe Abbet, Johan Baas, Steve Barba, Nicola Bolton, Gary Clark, Martin Germans, Jason Hall, Harald Havas, Wende Huizer, Bob Lang, Bob Leenders, Annebet Leeuwis, Helmut Mauch, Rob Mulders, Barry Munden, Stefan Neuwinger, Herbert Plompen, Stefan & Mike Strasser, Peter Welleman, Heinz Wolf

name: Say Chocks Away
description:
The latest addition to the famous "Say..." series of aviation cartoons and humor books by Martin Leeuwis and Ton van Andel. Another 160 pages of cartoons and short anecdotes, aimed at all pilots of the world.

English, 160 pages, black and white, A5 size softcover.

name: "Skyteam"
description:
This book is the "Best Of" of the popular "Say..." aviation humor series by Martin Leeuwis and Ton van Andel and contains a compilation of the best parts from all their books so far. 

Initially it was just created as a Christmas gift for the KLM pilots, but it turned out to be so successful, that they decided to reprint it and add it to their regular list of publications.

English, 160 pages, black and white, A5 size softcover.

name: Say Coffee or Tea
description:
The books of the two "Flying Dutchmen" Martin Leeuwis and Ton van Andel contain lots of aviation humor in the form of cartoons, anekdotes and jokes.

Published by Martin Leeuwis publications in 2001.

name: Say Heading
description:
The books of the two "Flying Dutchmen" Martin Leeuwis and Ton van Andel contain lots of aviation humor in the form of cartoons, anekdotes and jokes.

Published by Martin Leeuwis publications in 2003

name: Say Something
description:
25 years after their first publication, Martin Leeuwis and Ton van Andel have publisher their 8th book. Another 160 pages of cartoons and short anecdotes, aimed at all pilots of the world.

English, 160 pages, black and white, A5 size softcover.

name: Say Again
description:
The books of the two "Flying Dutchmen" Martin Leeuwis and Ton van Andel contain lots of aviation humor in the form of cartoons, anekdotes and jokes.

Published by Martin Leeuwis publications in 1982.

This here is their first book and is influenced by their time in the miltary. Martin Leeuwis was an F-16 pilot so this book features lots of great F-16 and airforce humor. You will see that a lot of, now "classic", aviation jokes actually come from that book back in the early eighties....

name: DVD - Fritzkrieg
description:
What's red, furry and on your six? 
Find out in the hilarious cartoon aerial adventures of Fritz the Fox. A must for all World War Two history and aviation buffs, and fun for all ages, this first volume of Fritz the Fox cartoons features Fritz as a daring and largely unlucky uberpilot of the Luftwaffe flying from one airborne misadventure to another . Loaded with DVD-ROM extras!

Great airplane animations! Situation based humor (no dialog) and great soundtrack.

Creator: Barry Munden
Format: NTSC
Region: All Regions
Number of discs: 1
Studio: Boom and Zoom Graphics
DVD Release Date: August 30, 2007
Run Time: 20 minutes

name: Christmas Card "Right of Way"
description:
This card isn't just your average funny Christmas card! 
It's a complete comic strip as well!
Read it from front cover, to middle, to back cover!


AVAILABLE NOW!



Includes envelope.
Product dimensions: 5x7"

name: Christmas Card 5-PACK "Right of Way"
description:
5-PACK or 10-PACK of our latest Christmas Card creation!

It's a Christmas Card AND a comic strip in one!


SAVE MONEY BY BUYING IN BULK!

5 cards, including envelopes. Product dimensions: 5x7”

name: Christmas Card "Last Minute Charter"
description:
Never accept a last minute charter at Christmas Eve, or you will end up like Chuck, Julio, Sally and Hans! 

Outside of card shows the Roost Air Crew tied in front of Santas sleigh, with Julio telling Hans to "never accept a last minute charter at Christmas Eve". The inside shows them taking off in front of a beautiful winter landscape.  

Includes envelope. 
Product dimensions: 5x7”

name: Christmas Card 5-PACK "Last Minute Charter"
description:
Never accept a last minute charter at Christmas Eve, or you will end up like Chuck, Julio, Sally and Hans! Outside shows the Roost Air Crew tied in front of Santas sleigh, with Julio telling Hans to "never accept a last minute charter at Christmas Eve". The inside shows them taking off in front of a beautiful winter landscape.  

SAVE MONEY BY BUYING IN BULK!

5-PACK or 10-PACK !


Includes 5 envelopes. Product dimensions: 5x7”

name: Christmas Card "Have a fun Christmas"
description:
The perfect Christmas card for pilots and aviation enthusiasts! 

The outside of this card shows an airplane that appears to be steered by a flying snowman. On the inside you can see Julio and Sally working on a snowman, who obviously just got beheaded by a reckles pilot. Uhm... Chuck, is that you?


Envelope included. Product dimensions: 5x7”

name: Christmas Card "Christmas Hugs"
description:
Do you know a special someone who also has a “loved one” in the hangar? Then this card is perfect for you! 

The outside shows the message "Everybody needs a hug at Christmas" and Chuck with a Santa hat running towards the viewer. On the inside you see Chuck hugging his airplane and the message "So don't forget to hug all your loved ones! Merry Christmas!" 

Envelope included. Product dimensions: 5x7”

name: Christmas Card 5-PACK "Christmas Hugs"
description:
Do you know a special someone who also has a “loved one” in the hangar? Then this card is perfect for you! The outside shows the message "Everybody needs a hug at Christmas" and Chuck with a Santa hat running towards the viewer. On the inside you see Chuck hugging his airplane and the message "So don't forget to hug all your loved ones! Merry Christmas!"

SAVE MONEY BY BUYING IN BULK!

5-PACK or 10-PACK !!


5 cards, or 10 cards, including envelopes. Product dimensions: 5x7”

name: Classic Instrument Coasters
description:
Chuck has them all over his house! Not only to show off and impress the chicks but also to keep current! . . . 

. . . but somehow neither one seems to be working for him.


Trintec's round coasters are made of clear acrylic and have four rubber feet on their underside to ensure stability and avoid surface damage.
Dimensions: 3.875" diameter
Imprint area: 3.625"

name: Vintage Instrument Drink Coasters
description:
Chucks favorite set of coasters since they almost resemble F4-U gages! 

This Vintage Instrument six-pack coaster set almost resembles the cockpit of Chuck's Corsair . . . almost.

Of course he wouldn't know since he doesn't have an instument panel for his vintage F4-U Corsair yet. But you better believe he has one of these sets! We also like the fact that it comes in a set of 6 instead of the usual 4 coasters you see everywhere else.

The Trintec coasters are made with a tough polystyrene frame and a black rubber anti-skid base. Sold in sets of 6. 

Another unique treat we think is that the actual package ships out arranged like a real IFR six-pack set-up. Perfect to fit your own ice cold six-pack right out of the beer fridge!

name: Sally's Airplane Cookie Cutters
description:
Just in time for the Holidays: Sally's airplane cookie cutters!

Are you tired of the same old cookie shapes? The stars, the angels, and the christmas trees? Check out how Sally shapes her cookies - aviation style!

Quantity: One Tin Cookie Cutter

(does not come with cookie dough, since we're based in Vegas we want to shy away from selling anything perishable)

name: Sally's Helicopter Cookie Cutters
description:
Just in time for the Holidays: Sally's helicopter cookie cutters!

Are you tired of the same old cookie shapes? The stars, the angels, and the christmas trees? Check out how Sally shapes her cookies - aviation style!

With Sally being Sally, this one is "loosely based" on what she calls "Airwolf". You can kinda see a Bell 222 in there if you look closely, right?

Quantity: One Tin Cookie Cutter

(does not come with cookie dough, since we're based in Vegas we want to shy away from selling anything perishable)

name: Key Chain - "Airplane Keys"
description:
Are you as tired of the old “Remove Before Flight” flimsy keychains with the letters screenprinted on it as we are?

Here is something fresh, new and tough! The raised white lettering is embroidered on both sides of a stiff, durable, narrow bordered material. It comes with a large steel ring to easily hold all types of keys and measures 5 ½” x 1”.

name: Key Chain - "Helicopter Pilot"
description:
Chuck is really proud of his key chain!

Are you as tired of the old “Remove Before Flight” flimsy keychains with the letters screenprinted on it as we are?

Here is something fresh, new and tough! The raised white lettering is embroidered on both sides of a stiff, durable, narrow bordered material. It comes with a large steel ring to easily hold all types of keys and measures 5 ½” x 1”.

name: Key Chain "Flight Crew"
description:
Are you as tired of the old “Remove Before Flight” flimsy keychains with the letters screenprinted on it as we are?

Here is something fresh, new and tough! The raised white lettering is embroidered on both sides of a stiff, durable, narrow bordered material. It comes with a large steel ring to easily hold all types of keys and measures 5 ½” x 1”.

name: Infant Aviator Bib, 8 hours bottle to throttle
description:
Get your baby started in aviation right away and teach him/her about aviation safety!

These cute aviation themed bibs for infants and toddlers, are self-tie and 100% cotton terry-velour, with spill-proof nylon backing.
8" x 10"
Made in USA.

name: This Is Your Captain Speaking
description:
This Is Your Captain Speaking - A Common Sense Manual for Keeping Your Wings Level
By Captain Ed Owen

While admittedly somewhat limited (about the width and height of an aircraft windscreen) and woefully short of the "big picture", the pilot's perspective offers some unique insights. Those insights are presented as a series of tales (of the sort told by flight crews everywhere) that, while amusing and lighthearted, give reason to pause and think.
Published by iUniverse, Inc. (December 20, 2004)
296 pages, English
ISBN 0595331793
Product Dimensions: 9.0 x 6.0 x 0.7 inches 
Shipping Weight: 15.5 ounces. 

Our Review: 
You really have to check out the unique tales of this pilot. We have taken him in and made him a Chicken Wings character for many reasons but one sticks out: He is really funny !!

His book is really a good gift for anybody you know who loves to read. It's a compilation of tales and funny stories that are very, very loosely connected. This alone also makes it perfect for a pilot like Chuck who can’t follow a storyline through the whole book. But you don’t have to be a pilot to enjoy this book. It’s a lighthearted outlook on life through the eyes of an aviator. We would even go a step further and claim him to be sort of a “modern Saint Exupery” we like the book so much. It is also extremely well written and a real pleasure to read.

name: Squawk 7700
description:
Even though this book is not the classic "Chicken Wings style" humor book, we highly recommend this work for everybody who is interested in flying for the airlines. 
This book is an eyeopener about how the business really works and Peter, who is personal friend of ours, is a driving force in making aviation a safer place. Embark on a journey with him and follow his career from dreaming about flying as a little boy all the way to flying for the airlines. You might get a slight "reality check" reading this book but we know many pilots who now wish they knew more about the industry before they started making their dream of flying the big planes come true.

It's not all "Top Gun" and big salaries out there in "the real world"....

All books come signed by the author!

Foreword by Jeff Skiles, Hudson Miracle Co-Pilot of US Airways Flight 1649


Published by Peter M. Buffington
ISBN-10: 0-9712084-1-7
ISBN-13: 987-0-9712084-1-4
 
Author welcomes email feedback at:
avitengineer@yahoo.com
 
This book was written, printed, and published in the USA!

name: The Rogue Aviator
description:
Join the fearless and funny aviator Ace Abbott on his journey through the back alleys of aviation. This is a really well written, funny, yet often “keeping you on the edge of your seat” and “I can’t believe this actually happens” adventurous book.
Ace’s constant positive outlook on life throughout his adventures and his love for the ladies and enjoying the little things in life reminds us of Chuck in many ways. 

There are so many stories in this book; the only downside we see is that it’s not long enough. Some of the chapters and adventures in his book could be their own separate books. 

All books come signed by the author!
 
Published by Allen Morris
236 Pages
ISBN-13: 978-0-578-08508-1
 
Conceived, written, printed, and published in the United States of America

name: True Pilot Stories
description:
True Pilot Stories is a collection of stories by veteran writer Patricia Lorenz and over 50 commercial, cargo, military, private, experimental, helicopter, hot-air balloon and blimp pilot pilots from all over the country. 
Male, female, young, old, these true stories will give you a whole new feel and understanding of the world of aviation. From hilarious stories and pranks they pull on each other and their crews to white-knuckle, hair-raising adventure stories, air travel will suddenly take on a whole new meaning. Fasten your seat belt. You're in for the ride of your life. 

About the Author:
Patricia Lorenz is an art-of-living writer and speaker and is the author of six books and over four hundred published articles, essays and stories. She's one of the top contributors to the Chicken Soup for the Soul books with stories in over two dozen of them. She's contributing writer to three dozen anthologies and fifteen Daily Guideposts books; and an award-winning columnist. 

And Best of all:

The book includes as funny story written by Chicken Wings Creator Mike Strasser. It was his first attempt at book writing.

Paperback, 262 pages, English
Publisher: Infinity Publishing (September, 2005) 
ISBN: 0741427958 
Product Dimensions: 0.5 x 5.5 x 8.5 inches

name: The Vought F4U Corsair and its Contemporaries
description:
This is a great book for the aviation buff who has already read everything you can find about the F4U on wikipedia.
Written by our friend Tom Brinkman, this book takes a close look at the F4U Corsair from an aeronautical engineers point of view and compares it with the P51 Mustang, P-47 Thunderbolt, F6F Hellcat, and P-38 Lightining.

Many times already, we had discussions in the forum and on facebook about which is the better airplane. This book shows how the engineers saw it.

As you all know, Chuck is a Corsair nut, and you better believe he has one of those books!
all books are:
SIGNED BY THE AUTHOR!

6th Edition
ISBN 978-1-60643-328-7

name: The $100 Hamburger
description:
Since its first publication in 1998, "The $100 Hamburger - A Guide to Pilot's Favorite Fly-In Restaurants" has become more than a book.
It's a cultural phenomenon felt far outside its intended target market, the general aviation small plane owner pilot. Virtually every aviation magazine has written about the book. The mainstream media has covered it as well. The book's companion website clocks over 450,000 site visits per month. (That's even more hits than we get with Chicken Wings, just to put it in perspective!) Each week it receives 50 to 10 updates (PIREPs) from the pilot readers. These PIREPs affect over 80% of the sites reported on in the book. Since the original reports from 1998 aren't accurate anymore, John Purner just recently came out with this Third Edition which features over 80% new content - new restaurants, new airports, and completely updated reports on both from pilots all over the US, Canada, and the UK.

The name "100$ Hamburger" may need revision as Nobu the chicken stated in one of our recent strips, but the guide and the destination all got revised very recently. This book will make a great gift for the new plane owner looking for places to go but also for every airport bum, traveler, or aviation enthusiast.
 
Brand: MCGRAW-HILL
Author: John F. Purner
508 pages
ISBN-13: 978-0-07-147925-7
ISBN-10: 0-07-147925-2

name: Everything Explained
description:
This is a huge book!
It's full of everything aviation.  And, we do mean everything.  This ultimate reference book explains all aspects of aviation from props to heavy jets.

Here's just a little of what you'll find:

- Everything you need to know about airspace and airports 
- A real world look at instrument flight from beginning to end.
- What's legal and what's not. 
- Everything about navigation, radios, and antennas
- GPS, WAAS, ADS-B, HF, and more 
- Interrelationship of speed, altitude, jet/turbine operations.  
- Details on certificates, documents, logging time, drugs, medical. 
- Weather, icing, NOTAMs, FSS direct back door cell numbers 
- Part 135 and Part 121 operations 
- definitions, W&B, qualifications, FT&D 
- Commercial operations 
- OpSpecs, ramp checks, checkrides, PRIA 
and:
How to handle an emergency and what to do if you're charged with a violation 
Reference tables, virtually every rule of thumb, conversions and much, much more. 
Really, there's just too much in this book to summarize here.  

Private Pilot Magazine Senior Editor Norm Goyer read through the book and said, "KEEP THIS ONE!"

In April 2004, Flying Magazine said "EVERYTHING EXPLAINED packs together a wealth of funny explanations, cheesy clip art and tons of graphs and illustrations to actually make it, believe it or not, FUN to bone up on the regs!"

ISBN: 0974261300
8.5" x 11", 8th Edition Published February 2011
by Richie Lengel

Everything you need to know about aviation. All in one handy reference guide.

name: Flying, Just Plane Fun - Children's Book
description:
People who know us here at Chicken Wings know that we like to play with, and read everything we sell ourselves. And we also only endorse products we think are fun or informative. This is great book for young kids right after they’re out of the coloring-book phase. The book cover says it’s for ages 5 to 12, but we feel it’s more the 5 to 9 years range:
 
Softcover version of this unique, award winning, and top selling children’s book. Bright watercolor sketches meshed with playful photographs capture the fun and excitement of flying in an open-cockpit biplane above the green fields of Wisconsin. Technical information about flying is interwoven with a wonderful tale of a boy and his grandfather spending time together in the air.
Children’s Picture Book, Ages 5-12, 24 full-color pages
 
Reviews:
“It’s a perfect book for those who are not yet pilots and are curious about flying”
- Flying Magazine, June 2003
“Young aviation enthusiasts will enjoy this picture book about aviation written especially for them. It’s a well written, nicely illustrated book….that’s just plane fun to read!”
- Sport Aviation Magazine, July 2003

name: Julio's Hat "post-work"
description:
Here is how Julio's hat looks after doing a complete overhaul on the Twin Otter or the helicopter when forced to work with Chuck and pulling his hair out. All these over-nighters are taking a toll on Julio and respectively his ball cap...

You might find some sweaty feathers in this one!



District Threads, distressed Cap
Distressed finish, soft feel, looks like well loved favorite!
6 panels
closure: metal D-ring slider buckle with hide-away strap

name: FAR & Airspace Poster
description:
This poster features a graphical depiction of different airspace classes and other selected FAR 91 Regulations. It's a great tool for every flight student or everybody else who is still learning and helps visualize the nations airspace. 

Hang it in your bathroom and learn while you . . . . well, you know!

Dimensions: 11" tall by 33" wide

name: Student Pilot Flight Log
description:
As far as we have seen, this is the classiest, best laid out little introductory logbook on the market. You’ll love the graphics and the clarity which include emphasis shading, even little aircraft icons to identify the Category & Class columns.
 
Turning the page:

- First there is a space to record Student, Flight School, and CFI information,

- Next, pertinent Radio Frequencies and Airplane Information

- Then there is a concise Private Pilot Training record in three phases,

- Followed by five (double) pages, each with five lines, for recording your first flights.

- The back two pages even have preprinted Endorsements and Notes
 
The book cover is sturdy, back leather-textured, and measures 4.25”H x 7.25”W.

name: DVD - "Close Calls" - Lessons To Live By
description:
We are firm believers that you don’t need to make all mistakes yourself to become a better pilot. And it’s always a very good idea to learn from other pilots experiences. In my aviation career I have learned as much from books and stories about flying as I did during my commercial training if not more. On several occasions, a story I remembered reading or some one telling has gotten me out of a sticky situation. This DVD is a perfect example for: Learning from the Masters.
 
Aviation masters, Bob Hoover and Wayne Handley, share the wisdom gained from more than 50,000 (!) hours of combined flying experience, often in extreme conditions. Each of them share how they survived near-impossible-to-escape inflight emergencies by applying simple safety principles. 
Total Run time: 92 minutes.
 
“Needless to say, it’s thoroughly enjoyable. More importantly, it serves a great purpose. There are some valuable lessons to be learned from Hoover and Handley. They’re been there; they are masters, so they know of what they speak. Everyone who flies an airplane can benefit from this DVD, although I fervently hope that no one has need to apply the lessons learned.”
Capt. Barry Schiff (who has logged 27,000 hrs himself)

name: Aviator Sunglasses "Argento2" - rose
description:
The rimless Aviator frame is a must for every pilot and anyone who enjoys the complete coverage an aviator frame provides. The aviator look has also become a fashion must have! Enjoy the coverage, the look, and the comfort this frame allows. Made for maximum headset comfort in the cockpit! The ultra light beta titanium frame is made in Japan. The high tech lens is made in Italy. Pictured with the Copper-Rose HDL-3C lens. 

The pilot's eyes are the most important instruments in the entire plane. By perfectly balancing luminance and chromatic contrast, VedaloHD sunglasses give pilots the best visual acuity possible. That means increased depth perception for cloud formations, landmarks, runways and other aircraft. What's more, the non-polarized HDL-3C® lenses are perfect for reading LCD displays and instrumentation within the cloud deck because there's no need for flipping up. This results in perfect visibility inside and outside the cockpit. Whether you're flying VFR or IFR, sunshine or in the soup, VedaloHD will result in perfect visibility. 

The VedaloHD difference is the exclusive HDL-3C lens technology. The HDL-3C lens technology has been scientifically designed to increase visual performance by utilizing a tri-stimulus filtering process that is impregnated directly into the lens itself that shortens the eye's receptors response time producing increased color sensitivity and improved chromatic contrast.
This new process is not merely a tint or a coating applied to the lens like all other conventional lenses on the market that actually diminish color but a new High Definition technology built directly into the HDL-3c lens itself that brings out color so now your eyes can see color through a sun filter! 

•Features:
NXT® Lens Technology
High strength Beta-Titanium wire frameware.
Wide angle Titanium alloy hinges for amazing comfort especially under a headset
Multi-point frameware anchors are screwed –not pressed- into the rimless lenses
Unbreakable NXT® cast-polyurethane polymer HDL-3C lenses. They simply will not crack, break down, or distort.
•Package includes:
Felt-Lined Smash-Proof Clamshell Case
The Signature Line comes with a hard clamshell case that has a spring hinge for easy opening and closing
Microfiber Cleaning Cloth

Please always use only the Microfiber Cleaning Cloth/tote provided with your sunglasses to clean them as this will ensure maximum lens life and keep your lenses operating in optimal condition. 

* Product will be shippped from either our wearhouse or from our dealer location in Alabama.

name: Aviator Sunglasses "Rosso2" - rose
description:
The Rosso2 style with the rose lenses are Nobu's favorite pair! Nobu was the one who turned Mike on to rose lenses over smoke because he's always preferred them for flying external loads.  

Similar to the Azzurros Mike (and Sean Tucker, btw!) wear, they have a slightly more "square" look to them but are made of the same quality lenses and same thin Beta-Titanium frameware. 

The rimless Aviator frame is a must for every pilot and anyone who enjoys the complete coverage an aviator frame provides. The aviator look has also become a fashion must have! Enjoy the coverage, the look, and the comfort this frame allows. Made for maximum headset comfort in the cockpit! The ultra light beta titanium frame is made in Japan. The high tech lens is made in Italy. Pictured with the Copper-Rose HDL-3C lens. 
The pilot's eyes are the most important instruments in the entire plane. By perfectly balancing luminance and chromatic contrast, VedaloHD sunglasses give pilots the best visual acuity possible. That means increased depth perception for cloud formations, landmarks, runways and other aircraft. What's more, the non-polarized HDL-3C® lenses are perfect for reading LCD displays and instrumentation within the cloud deck because there's no need for flipping up. This results in perfect visibility inside and outside the cockpit. Whether you're flying VFR or IFR, sunshine or in the soup, VedaloHD will result in perfect visibility. 
The VedaloHD difference is the exclusive HDL-3C lens technology. The HDL-3C lens technology has been scientifically designed to increase visual performance by utilizing a tri-stimulus filtering process that is impregnated directly into the lens itself that shortens the eye's receptors response time producing increased color sensitivity and improved chromatic contrast.
This new process is not merely a tint or a coating applied to the lens like all other conventional lenses on the market that actually diminish color but a new High Definition technology built directly into the HDL-3c lens itself that brings out color so now your eyes can see color through a sun filter! 

•Features:
NXT® Lens Technology
High strength Beta-Titanium wire frameware.
Wide angle Titanium alloy hinges for amazing comfort especially under a headset
Multi-point frameware anchors are screwed –not pressed- into the rimless lenses
Unbreakable NXT® cast-polyurethane polymer HDL-3C lenses. They simply will not crack, break down, or distort.
•Package includes:
Felt-Lined Smash-Proof Clamshell Case
Microfiber Cleaning Cloth

*Product will be shipped either directly from our warehouse or from our dealer location in Alabama.

name: T-Shirt "Corsair"
description:
Hot Wings Series:

This design is another shot at a cool shirt instead of going for funny or cute. The Vought F4-U Corsair is our favorite airplane ever, so no wonder Chuck is loving them too and trying to build one. This shirt is a tribute to a world class famous fighter plane from back in the day, Chicken Wings Style.

Design printed in the front in faded red and dark grey. 
Shirt Color: smoke grey

Hanes Style 50/50 high quality shirt 

(50% pre-shrunk cotton, 50% polyester)

Machine washable

name: T-Shirt "First Solo"
description:
"I survived my first solo flight!" 
A future pilots first solo flight is a big event in everybodies life. Show all your friends what you have accomplished! Or buy one for the special someone in your life who has just soloed. 
We kept the shirt in white to accomodate the old custom of ripping or cutting the students pilots shirt off after his flight and being able to write on it.

name: T-Shirt "First Solo - Helicopter"
description:
"I survived my first solo flight!" 
This is the helicopter version of our most popular shirt. I was often given a hard time by my fellow sling wing pilots about not having a helicopter shirt since I fly them for a living. Well, here it is!

It's the same white high quality cotton shirt, kept simple so your instructor can write on it and to keep the cost down. Show all your friends what you just accomplished!! Soloing a helicopter for the first time is a big event! Or if you shopping for someone you know who just soloed, get him/her this shirt to show how much you appreciate them making it back to terra firma safely all by themselves.

name: T-Shirt "Helicopter Maneuvers"
description:
Show the world you know how to pick up women and that you are current on all your flight maneuvers at the same time! 
There will be an official investigation to see if this shirt will actually be beneficial as an aid to pick up "chicks".
(Yes, we at "Chicken Wings" are allowed to say "chicks" without any consequences. It says so in our Trademark!)

Available in black or navy blue!

name: T-Shirt "UH-1 Huey" - regular fit
description:
High quality cotton t-shirt featuring a Vietnam Era Army UH-1B Helicopter. No further explanation necessary. The Huey was the coolest helicopter to ever take to the skies, period. Officially licensed by Bell Helicopter, a Textron Company.

Image printed on the front in ammo-can yellow or white.

6.1 oz. high quality cotton t-shirt 

Machine washable

100% cotton

Color: military green

name: Airplane Paper Clips
description:
These paperclips are 1" in size. They come 40 to a pack and are stored in the included aluminum aviation storage tin. 
(which probably isn't aviation grade aluminum and more like tin but it's pretty neat either way)

name: Helicopter Paper Clips
description:
Chuck has them littered all over his office!

Any helicopter fan will want these 1.5" long silver helicopter shaped paper clips. They come with 25 of them attractively packaged in a desktop ready storage tin.

name: Desk Alarm Clock, Altimeter
description:
Trintec classic aviation alarm clocks are made to simulate a primary flight instrument as closely as possible. This alarm clock features the actual shape of an altimeter with a dial that closely represents an altimeter as well.
 
Features:
- Injection molded from high impact styrene and features a real glass lens for durability and scratch resistance. In other words, it’s almost Chuck-safe!
- High quality American made Quartz alarm clock movement for accuracy and many years of reliable service.
 
One AA alkaline battery required (not included).
Comes with one year warranty from the factory.
 
Dimensions: 3.5” x 3.5”

name: EGOLETS, 5 Stripe Gag Epaulets, Gold
description:
This gag gift is pretty much our favorite item in the store. Five gold stripes in black epaulet.

Designed to do your Captain a "one-up" to see if he notices, or maybe you're even brave enough to put them on when you're going on your next airline flight. You never know it might get you into the cockpit. Or try to wear them during an interview?!

Disclaimer: "Chicken Wings" does not take responsibility if the joke backfires. The timing is up to you. Use responsibly!

name: EGOLETS, 5 Stripe Gag Epaulets, Silver
description:
This gag gift is pretty much our favorite item in the store. Five silver stripes in black epaulet.

Designed to do your Captain a "one-up" to see if he notices, or maybe you're even brave enough to put them on when you're going on your next airline flight. You never know it might get you into the cockpit. Or try to wear them during an interview?!

Disclaimer: "Chicken Wings" does not take responsibility if the joke backfires. The timing is up to you. Use responsibly!

name: Aviator Flashlight, black - red/white LED
description:
Designed for pilots, here’s a great alternative to the expensive, night-vision LED flashlights. 
With a similar quality look and feel, the Lux-Pro Aviator features one 3-function button switch, switching from RED light to WHITE light to OFF. It operates on 3 AAA batteries, conveniently loaded in a removable holder.

Mike and almost all the pilots working with him use this flashlight for all their night flights and they love it! It’s “Huey-tested” so to speak….

name: Coffee Mug "Jet Fuel Only"
description:
Chuck uses this one to show off and so he can tell people "I love the smell of Jet Fuel in the morning".....

This 16 oz. stainless, double-wall insulated mug helps a pilot’s personal fuel supply stay hot or cold, and will certainly draw humorous attention. 
Padded non-slip bottom, no-spill lid, 6 5/8" tall, 3 3/8" diameter.

name: Coffee Mug "Avgas Only"
description:
We all know how much pilots and mechanics love their coffee! Julio couldn’t function without it. He has this mug within reach at all times. But at least, Sally makes the best coffee at the airport!
 
This 16 oz. stainless, double-wall insulated mug helps a pilot’s personal fuel supply stay hot or cold, and will certainly draw humorous attention. 
The placard is super-sized so even Hans can read it with his thick glasses!
Padded non-slip bottom, no-spill lid, 6 5/8" tall, 3 3/8" diameter.

name: Silver Chicken (10 Year Anniversary Silver Coin)
description:
HEAR YE! HEAR YE!

ONE SINGLE COIN HAS MADE IT BACK TO US THROUGH CIRCULATION. THERE ARE LESS THAN 60 OF THESE COINS IN CIRCULATION AND ONLY A FEW WE WILL KEEP FOR OUR FAMILY BUT WE'RE WILLING TO LET THIS ONE GO ONCE AGAIN!

ORDER NOW BEFORE IT'S GONE AGAIN!

The front of the “Silver Chicken”, our 10 year anniversary commemorative coin, is very loosely based on the American Silver Eagle One Dollar Silver Coin when it comes to the layout. But it’s more awesome since it features one of the coolest WW2 fighter planes ever built. Also it’s funnier because it has Chuck on the face of the coin instead of Lady Liberty (no offense Lady Liberty, we love you!).

Also, even though the numbers of the 2011 Eagles aren’t final yet, the mintage of the 2010 Silver Eagle was 34,764,500 ounces.

The mintage of the “Silver Chicken” is 60 ounces (60 coins). So naturally, it will be worth way more in the future. Or if not, it’s still pure silver and we all know the price of silver is bound to go up.

Specifications:

Size: 39mm diameter

Encapsulated to keep Chuck shiny for a long time

Strike: Proof-Like

Weight: 1.1 ounces (one troy ounce of .999 fine silver)

Ships with or without fancy blue case (you choose)

Ships with a little certificate from the mint certifying authenticity

name: Bumper Sticker "Caution"
description:
Show your appreciation for airplanes and airports with this bright and colorful bumper sticker!
Great new bumper sticker. Self explanitory, we believe!

"CAUTION! This Vehicle Stops At All Airports!"

3" tall and 11.5" wide.

We like it so much we have one on our "Chicken"-Mobile!

name: Bottle Opener - Alcohol FAR's 91.17
description:
When it's time to imbibe, here is a wallet-handy, credit card-sized bottle opener with "FAR 91.17 - Alcohol or drugs" to show that you're a pilot and know the Regs.
A corner hole allows for use as a key chain or to hang on a hook.

Heavy 14 gauge stainless steel
3 5/16" x 2 1/8"

name: WWII Airplane Spotter Playing Cards
description:
Chucks favorite deck of cards. Could there be an F-4 Corsair in there?

Each card features 3 silhouettes of an Allied and Axis Power WWII aircraft, as it would be seen by a ground observer or from another airplane. They had aircraft recognition charts just like it in WWII and of course that makes it really interesting for our hero Chuck.

Play cards and learn about these classic airplanes!

name: Copter Toy
description:
These rubber band powered helicopters can fly up to 75 feet for hours of flying fun. Comes in clear protective packaging with bright colored graphics and hang tab for easy display. 
They keep Chuck busy all day! (Julio hates them)

Three different helicopter models.
Army Copter
Rescue Copter
Police Copter

Size:13" High
Manufacturer:Paul K. Guillows
Ages:8 and up
Choking Hazard Under 3 Years

name: “Japanese Skywriter” Mouspad / Notepad
description:
This multifunctional product is a mouse pad, a notepad, and a funny joke rolled into one! Use it for your mouse, scribble down notes, and when you’re done, simply rip off the top page and take it with you. Product is the size of a typical mouse pad with rounded corners and has 50 pages.

Product dimensions: 9.5 x 7.5 inch, with 50 sheets of paper, glued on two sides, rounded corners.

name: Outlet - T-Shirt "Are You Chicken?"
description:
From our "Hot Wings" series.

We're phasing this one out to make room for more designs.
ONLY A FEW SIZES LEFT!!

This shirt displays attitude (the "good attitude" kind... also note Chuck is keeping "the blue side up" on this one!!) and some brass ones to challenge your fellow aviators. I hope we don't have to put a disclamer on this one after reports of illegal air-races come in...

6.1oz cotton shirt

name: Outlet - The Second Book
description:
WE OPENED A BAD BATCH!

SOME COVER PAGES WERE STUCK TOGETHER BUT THE REST OF THE BOOK IS FINE!

Damages with this book are mainly on the coating of the cover around the spine right at the groove where some of the blue paint came off. Alle pages are in perfect condition and the color is brilliant. No other dents or flaws.

We think the books may have been packed before the paint was dry all the way so they stuck together slightly when taken out of certain boxes.

Some of them are barely visible, the just don't look the 100% we expect. So, get this book for a great price if a little scratch doesn't concern you!

name: Outlet - T-Shirt "Let's Fly"
description:
Sometimes you need a little help with getting off the ground. But with this t-shirt at least there is no doubt about your intentions! Let’s fly! Main design printed on the front and flying feathers on the backside.

Color: Cardinal Red.

only a few sizes left !!

name: Outlet - The First Book
description:
Some of these books may have minor flaws we're not happy with but they're still good books. They may have scratches or issues with the spine but no bent over pages. And some may be left over from an older publisher we don't use anymore and just have a different back and ISBN number.

So, get this book for a great price if a little scratch doesn't concern you!

name: T-Shirt "Jane - Classic Green"
description:
The “Panaca Jane” Tee is the classic design originally worn by the helicopter crew of Panaca Jane and the fellow firefighters and smoke jumpers who worked with them.

Panaca Jane logo printed on the back in off-white.

6.1 oz. high quality cotton t-shirt 

Machine washable

100% cotton

Color: olive drab military green

name: Longsleeve Shirt "Black Smoke"
description:
Smoke colored Long Sleeve authentic pigment t-shirt, “garment washed”, for those slightly colder days. Extremely comfortable and fairly long sleeves which taller guys will appreciate.

Panaca Jane logo printed on the back with printed left sleeve in black. 

Machine washable

94% spun cotton, 6% organic ring spun cotton

Color: Smoke

name: Longsleeve Shirt "Grey Smoke"
description:
Smoke colored Long Sleeve authentic pigment t-shirt, “garment washed”, for those slightly colder days. Extremely comfortable and fairly long sleeves which taller guys will appreciate.

Panaca Jane logo printed on the back with printed left sleeve in classic off-white. 

Machine washable

94% spun cotton, 6% organic ring spun cotton

Color: Smoke
